14.6. Recurrent Neural Network Models 276
months, is divided into multiple subsequences, each read by the CNN model, e.g. 3 subsequence
of 12 time steps. It may make sense to divide the sub-sequences by years, but this is just a
hypothesis, and other splits could be used, such as six subsequences of six time steps. Therefore,
this splitting is parameterized with the n seq and n steps for the number of subsequences and
number of steps per subsequence parameters.
